div.p: This code system http://nhn.no/fhir/nilar/CodeSystem/identifier-source-cs defines the following codes:

tr.td: Id for the message ('envelope') used to convey the report. Useful in some tracing scenarios.
Id of the service request, given by the requester.
Id of the service request, given by the service provider.
Id of the analysed subbject (Spesimen), given by the requester.
Id of the analysed subbject (Spesimen), given by the service provider.
Id of the ServReport (DiagnosticReport), always given by service provider.
Id of the ServReport (DiagnosticReport), always given by service provider.

description.value: Various resources has one or two identifiers, provided by requester or service provider. These are naming systems used to identify the origin of the identifiers.

definition.value: Id for the message ('envelope') used to convey the report. Useful in some tracing scenarios.
Id of the service request, given by the requester.
Id of the service request, given by the service provider.
Id of the analysed subbject (Spesimen), given by the requester.
Id of the analysed subbject (Spesimen), given by the service provider.
Id of the ServReport (DiagnosticReport), always given by service provider.
Id of the ServReport (DiagnosticReport), always given by service provider.
